column1: # Description: This file contains monthly mean 2m temperature datas from ERA5 averaged over the entire globe (0–360°E
# Reference period: Anomalies are calculated relative to the July average during the 1991-2020 reference period.
# Data source: The original gridded ERA5 monthly data used to generate the time series can be downloaded from the C3S Climate Data Store (CDS) at this address:
